title: DoubleSafe
summary: DoubleSafe is a two-factor authentication app
developerAddress:
825 E. Middlefield Road,
Mountain View, CA 94043
description: DoubleSafe is a two-factor authentication app that adds an additional layer of security, by requesting an additional code, when you sign in to your account. • If you choose to use Push Notifications, the DoubleSafe app will display a message asking you to ‘Allow’ or ‘Deny’ access to your user account. Confirm it is you logging in by selecting ‘Allow’. • If you are using one-time passcodes, the DoubleSafe app will generate a one-time passcode that must be entered in order to access your account.
descriptionHTML:
DoubleSafe is a two-factor authentication app that adds an additional layer of security, by requesting an additional code, when you sign in to your account.

• If you choose to use Push Notifications, the DoubleSafe app will display a message asking you to ‘Allow’ or ‘Deny’ access to your user account. Confirm it is you logging in by selecting ‘Allow’.

• If you are using one-time passcodes, the DoubleSafe app will generate a one-time passcode that must be entered in order to access your account.
